summary: Tasks lack sufficient coverage for the /goodbye endpoint. Missing explicit error handling task and insufficient acceptance criteria for edge cases.

findings.evidence: Test task does not specify error case coverage (e.g., what happens when /goodbye returns 500). SOP requires all endpoints to have tests covering error paths.
Task acceptance criteria do not specify expected JSON response structure (e.g., {"message": "Goodbye World"}). Without explicit structure, implementation may diverge from existing /hello pattern.

formatted_findings:
